name: ligapedd-site
description: Portal da Liga Pernambucana de Direito Digital

scripts.build: tailwindcss -i themes/ligapedd-v2/src/css/styles.css -o themes/ligapedd-v2/static/css/styles.css --minify && mkdir themes/ligapedd-v2/static/js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- themes/ligapedd-v2/src/js/*.js > themes/ligapedd-v2/static/scripts.js && npm run hugo:build
